title: v5.0
summary: This update adds a new 'Performances' page to the website, adds new information and also has some major technical changes.

items.title: Added 'Performances' page
subpoints: Implemented systems to enter the performance related data, and for it to be displayed prettily on the website

Implemented opening of performances to view more information - you can click on the individually performances and you will be directed to the relevant page, or a window opens up showing information related to that performance

items.title: Removed 'Contribution' page
subpoints: A smaller page for contributing has been added under the 'About' page
Developer Note: This was removed due to the under-utilisation of the page, and it also cluttered up the sidebar - I received a grand total of 1 email over the 2 years the page was set up lol

items.title: Revamped 'Home' page
subpoints: Added 'Upcoming Events' - a section which can hold countdowns to big events
Added 'Website Updates' - a section which simply displays the recent updates to the website
Removed 'Creator's Message' - less annoying and preachy content on the website is always a plus

items.title: Changed navigation buttons on pages to a dropdown menu
subpoints: Access to different subpages is now done via this dropdown menu

items.title: Changed website to use proper links to link to different pages
subpoints: Access to webpages can now be done directly, e.g. vjchoir.github.io/sov/2015

Developer Note: Previously, the links were kinda janky and could only be accessed via something like 'vjchoir.github.io/sov#SOV2015' which was really ugly; this new system allows you to directly link different pages to people!

items.title: Implemented card based display for various parts of the site
subpoints: Previously it was some badly formatted and underwhelming jumble of items in a page that didn't layout properly - this card system should make it look and feel more modern

items.title: Added a bunch of content to the website
subpoints: Added information pertinent to the Batch of 2022 / 2023 (thanks Asher!)
Added photos for the Batch of 2021 / 2022 (thanks Claire!)
Added performances for 2014 to 2015
Added old photos for the Batch of 2017 / 2018 (can be found on the batch's 'Featured Photos' carousel at the bottom of the page)

items.title: Added music controls within the expanded Player
Updated 'About' descriptions for the choir
Added placeholders for personal playlists, missing batch photos
Improved 'Listen' page tutorial for link sharing
Implemented a conversion system for old playlist formats
subpoints: Developer Note: This is kind of an iffy fix to an issue caused by the updating of the song information - previously, the timing was a hardcoded mm:ss kind of thing (which was totally not great, that's why we changed it) and now it uses numbers so we can do calculations and funky math better. However, due to the way the playlists were saved in the past, previously saved playlists were incompatible with this new change, causing the 'Listen' page to pretty much break and old playlists would be unusuable. However, this new system gives the old playlist to the system that generates the sharing code, then converts it back into the new format that the website uses! It works, and your playlists are retained from previous versions! If you didn't understand this, it's ok! You're probably unaffected!

items.title: Updated the underlying technology and codebase
subpoints: Update Angular to version 14, along with other reliant components
Removed a bunch of unused libraries that were causing clutter or deprecated
Refactored a bunch of components so that they're cleaner and give me less of a headache when I update the site every year
Standardised timings to use UTC time (in milliseconds) and durations (in seconds)

items.title: (Hopefully) Fixed most issues regarding the player and playlist system
Fixed the audio of SOV2007's 'Counting Frogs' - a portion of the audio was cut off

title: v4.1
summary: This update mainly updates information regarding the various batches and adds a few SOVs. It also fixes some bugs inherent in the website.

items.title: Added batch information for batches of 2020/2021 and 2021/2022 (thanks Claire!)
Added songs and playlist information for SOV2007 and SOV2008 (thanks Ling Kang!)
subpoints: Users are able to navigate through SOVs of 2007 and 2008, adding them to their respective playlists if they desire

items.title: Fixed bugs in the website

title: v4
summary: Updated the site into an Angular-based web application, with more functionalities.

items.title: Converted most / all of the code into Angular
Added the website's player
subpoints: Player allows you to play songs from SOVs throughout the website
Player can be minimised and expanded from bottom of website
Player reads custom created playlists

items.title: Revamped 'Listen' page
subpoints: Page is no longer for playing music, instead is for managing playlists
Added custom playlists and customisation features
Added sharing of playlists via links
Added tutorials to guide user through playlist creation
Added small toast notifcations to inform user of any actions
Added settings page for Listen

items.title: Revamped 'Symphony of Voices' pages
subpoints: Freshened up the page so that it's cleaner and looks better organised
Changed the styling of the repertoire
Added 'click to play' functionality for the songs: clicking on the songs now plays the song in the Player
Removed the YouTube embedded video: this was causing some page load errors which was irritating so I removed it

items.title: Revamped 'Contribution' page
subpoints: Added new descriptions and specific roles I'm looking for
Added a form for users to fill up for feedback / ideas

items.title: Changed navigation stuff
subpoints: Users should not have any issues linking directly to individual pages now. Pressing the back button should also lead you to the correct pages

items.title: Cleaned up data storage
subpoints: The storing of the website's data (in JSON format) was pretty messy and has been cleaned up now. Added a form for users to fill up for feedback / ideas

title: v3.4
summary: Added dark mode and updated some SOV data.

items.title: Added SOV2010's information (available on both the SOV page and listen page)

title: v3.3
summary: Added SOV2019, as well as refactored some code to make the site run better.

items.title: Added SOV2019's information (which includes download links, updates to the listen page)
Re-coded the website to make it more developer friendly (this is stuff you don't need to care about)
Reorganised information on the website (it was getting a bit too cluttered with different batches and SOVs, so I've put them on one landing page and you can access the rest from there)
Added a Contribution page, which includes detailed information on how to contribute without actually doing any of the coding stuff (leave that to us!)
Removed the Stories page - I have an idea of how to improve it but I don't have the time to code it out right now, and it kind of broke when I was updating the site so it'll be gone for a bit.
Redid the Listen page - now acts like a budget Spotify player with shuffle features and a Favourites playlist.

Remastered audio for SOV2012 and SOV2014 - previously these pieces of audio were quite trashy in quality but thanks to Mr Samuel Wong I have proper recordings of these SOVs now. The audio is much cleaner and nicer to listen to.
Redid the album art for SOV2012 and SOV2014
